title: Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 

(Renewable Transport Fuel Obligation Rate) (Revocation) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (renewable transport fuel obligation rate) (revocation) order 2023

title: Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 2. This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2024.
text_raw: 2. This Order comes into operation on 1 January 2024.

title: Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: 3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Renewable Transport
text_raw:
3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Renewable Transport 

Fuel Obligation Rate) Order 2022 (S.I. No. 709 of 2022) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [691] 3

title: Renewable Transport Fuel Functions Act 2023 (No. 2 of 2023), hereby order as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

To come into effect on 1 January 2024, this order revokes the National Oil 
Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Renewable Transport Fuel Obligation Rate) Order 
2022 (S.I. No.709 of 2022). 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [691]
